The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group Dear Parents, HAPPY NEW YEAR! Hopefully you all had a wonderful break and are looking forward to Term Two! Last term everyone worked hard to ensure a great start to the year. Well done to all! It has been fantastic to see how the children have bonded in their respective classes as well as bonding as a whole year group. Last term we had some wonderful events that everyone enjoyed such as: Book week, Swimming Gala, Movember, ISM’s Got Talent, the end of term Christmas Carol Service as well as the Year 3 Production (which was great). Spring Term Dates (12 weeks / 60 days) Monday 13th January - First day back. Friday 17th January – Interhouse ‘Capture the Flag’ begins. Tuesday 28th and Wednesday 29th January - ASAs begin Monday 17th February – Friday 21st February – International Week Friday 21st February - Mid Year Reports Monday 24th February – Friday 28th February - Half term (return Monday 3rd March)
Wednesday 5th March - World Maths Day Tuesday 18th and Wednesday 19th March - Last days of ASAs Tuesday 4th and Wednesday 5thth March - Parent-teacher Consultations 4-6pm Friday 11th April Last day of term - Noon finish This term is also the Year 1 Production, which we are sure you will enjoy very much. Tuesday 25th March at 9.15am and Wednesday 26th March at 6pm. It was fantastic to see how smart the children looked in their uniforms last term, please continue to help us with this. 1A and 1C were the uniform winners in term 1. We are all looking forward to Term Two being just as much fun and as productive as Term One. Let’s all do our best and work hard to achieve this! Please click here to download the Year 1 curriculum letter overview. Finally, many thanks to all parents who have helped to make this academic year start so well. Yours Sincerely, The Year 1 Team, Miss Candlish (Teacher 1A) Mr. Castro (At) Mrs. Maguire (Teacher 1B) Miss Likhareva(AT) Mr. Coburn (Teacher 1C) Miss. Lawrence (AT) Mr. Charlton (Year 1, 2 & 3 Phase Leader) Mrs. Doubleday (Head of Lower Campus) The International School of Moscow World Class Education __________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
